choices.A: A server must be assigned a machine
choices.B: A server must be assigned a listen port
choices.F: A server must be assigned a listen address
choices.D: A server can be associated with a server template
choices.C: A server's name cannot be changed after it is created
choices.E: Servers can have duplicate names as long as they have unique ports

discussion.content:
The right answer is: B,C,D
Not must to assigned a machine
We can change/duplicate the name 
Not must to assigned a listen address

questions.question_text:
You have an existing domain and need to add a new managed server to it.
Which three statements are true concerning the creation of managed servers? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
NEW state is the manager server is stopped
if server1 are not running so web1 can't be deployed

I will answer C
Because when try to stop any server that host a deployment .. the deployment status will be "NEW"

questions.question_text:
You access the Deployments page from the Administration Console. The targets and state of each application are displayed. One web application named web1 is targeted to server1 and is in the NEW state.
Which statement is true?

choices.D: web1 is in the process of being deployed to server1
choices.A: web1 is available but has never been accessed

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
It is definitely B and C based on the documentation.

Answer as per https://docs.oracle.com/middleware/1212/wls/CLUST/dynamic_clusters.htm#CLUST705 should be 8102 and 8103

Is it possible to please validate and correct the answer.. so that we can know if our understanding is not correct. thanks team

The right answer is: B,C
each time the server "port" will increment 1 also the "name"

questions.question_text:
You create a new dynamic cluster with the following parameters:
✑ Number of servers: 2
✑ Listen port: 8101
✑ Enable calculated listen ports: true
To which two port numbers will the resulting two dynamic servers bind? (Choose two.)
Which three statements are true about the Change Center in the Administration Console? (Choose three.)

choices.F: The Change Center is available only in a Production Mode domain
choices.A: The Change Center has a link to view any servers that need to be restarted
choices.E: After activating the changes to a server's configuration, you must always restart that server
choices.D: Locking the console prevents other privileged users from taking the lock until you release it or activate your changes
choices.B: In a Development Mode domain, the configuration lock can be acquired automatically
choices.C: The Change Center has a link to view the changes made so far

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
A correta é a C

questions.question_text:
As the technical lead for your project, you have been asked to recommend a new solution to handle frequently increasing loads on your applications. The
WebLogic 12.1.2 domain currently runs with two clusters of three servers with request being filtered and passed by a proxy server that users the round ""robin algorithm.
However, the load sometimes exceeds the maximum capacity of all these servers combined but your domain lacks in scalability.
What is the best implementation solution?

choices.A: Add a third cluster and spread existing server instances across the clusters.
choices.D: Tune work managers to optimize work.
choices.E: Replace the software load balancer with a hardware load balancer.
choices.B: Modify the proxy server load balancing algorithm to weight based.
choices.C: Configure dynamic clusters and specify the number of server instances you anticipate needing at peak load.
